Question.Subject: Why can't I download my photobucket album?
Question.Content:
I'm trying to download my own photobucket album by clicking the "download this album" button. Then i put in the two words (yes im spelling them right) and then i get a red error message:
- There was a problem starting your download
Archive Call Failed -
can someone help me?
Question.ChosenAnswer:
There could be alot of variables here. Need more specifics. e.g.
- How many pics in your album? (PB limit = 2500) - Do you have any ad/cookie/pop-up blocker, apps, plugins, or browser add-ons? - Do you have latest Javascript (http://java.com) or Adobe Flash player installs (http://get.adobe.com/flashplayer/)?
Feel free to email Photobucket support here: http://photobucket.com/contact
For specific help.
Also good help/FAQ resource on the PB site here: http://pic.pbsrc.com/help/PhotobucketHelp.htm :-)
Thx
